phrases: I had caught a terrible cold
and returned to the present-day world to get better.
All my friends came to visit me.
But then, I learned about the test the following day.
But my feverjust would not go down.
Just when I thought I would not make it...
Thanks to the potion that Inuyasha made for me,
I was able to get through the test somehow.
The weather's great and I feel great!
I am overmy cold... and I made it through the test.
It is all thanks to you, Inuyasha.
If you are that much better, let us justgo on back.
We will be going on a long journey,
so we have to stock up on supplies.
Last time, did not you tell me NOTto go out?
That was then, this is now.
When we are walking like this, it is as though we are on a date.
Okay Inuyasha, what do you want most?
Well, it is hard to choose...
W-When you have decided, let me know.
His foot slipped into the pail and he fell into the water.
It is his fault forbeing so clumsy.
No, just a huge lump on his head.
passed down through generations of Higurashi.
Tape this scale onto yournavel and sleep with it
Maybe he is not feeling well?
Well now, I will have to make red-bean rice to mark this milestone.
I will use that as a reason for yournext absence!
Such a wonderful sickness to have.
An important talk, man to man.
If you do not have anything to say, I am going.
W-What is this, all of a sudden?
Who said, I love you first?
Well, you are boyfriend and girlfriend, right?
If you were not her boyfriend,
Sis would not skip school to visit your time and all.
And you would not come here to take care of her.
So tell me, who said it first?
As if I would say that to Kagome!
Or maybe, neither of you have said anything?
And she sits next to me in the classroom.
But she is very cute with big, round eyes.
And she is fair and used to live abroad.
And she does not carry a backpack...
I did not understand all of that...
But in otherwords, you love this girl?
But I do not know how Hitomi feels about me.
I want to declare my love to her.
W- Why must he tell me all this?
Let me practice declaring my love with you.
If you are notgonna say it, I am going inside.
You do not have to laugh.
Why did not you come to me from the start?
I am much wiser about a girl's feelings than Inuyasha!
I will show you how!'Cuz you are my dear little brother!
During lunch break, allude to yourfeelings ever so slightly.
Then after class, call Hitomi out
and when you are all alone, make yourdeclaration.
I have to stay in this get-up and go to class until then?
And what is so bad about that?
This is an important moment in yourlife!
Kagome, did Hojo tell you he loves you?
And that is why you look so happy?
But you will be two-timing him.
You are saying that other guy has not declared his love foryou yet?
I am not talking about me.
He is going to declare his love in school today.
I wonder how he will do.
So different from the usual Kagome.
I called Hitomi out after school.
If you do not have anything to say, I am going home.
I do not like men who cannot speak up clearly.
So quit crying like a baby!
It is the same as being jilted!
I am a weakling and I am not worthy.
What are you trying to do with him?
This is all a matter of spirit.
As long as Sota gets into the spirit of doing it,
that is all that is necessary.
but that training you just did seems to be building up your strength.
I think you have gotten a bit stronger.
You are definitely a different Sota from awhile ago.
- Banzai! Banzai! - Why even Grandpa and Mom?
l-I feel like I have been tricked.
I am so disappointed in my youngerbrother.
Mulling overthe problem like that isn'tgonna solve anything.
If he loves her, he should just say so!
So you came back with your tail between yourlegs?
I realized that just a little training isn'tgoing to make me strong.
I cannot change my character thateasily!
Until you tell her, do not come back!
If you come back without telling her,
you will not be allowed inside!
It is all in the spirit!
Did not you say you love her?!
Pluck up your courage and go forit!
I have to watch over him.
You seem sorta different today, Sota.
I have something important to tell you.
Pluck up yourcourage and go forit!
And I am an indecisive person who cannot speak up.
T-They are only in the third grade!
What are you looking for, Shippo?
Kuroro, who lived in Koume's village.
A strange faith healerhad her banned from the village
Kuroro resembles Kirara and she is very smart.
Cats are natural enemies of rats.
Maybe this is connected to the village being overrun by a huge pack of rats!
The Suspicious Faith Healer and the Black Kirara
I will take care of things here!
